articles.description: Jimin of BTS has released a music video for “Set Me Free Pt. 2” ahead of the release of his solo debut album, ‘Face,’ on March 24. In the video, Jimin dances with a poem by Rainer Maria Rilke on his chest. Past solo songs include ‘Lie’ and ‘Filter.’
